name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WhatsApp a number without adding a contact

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension opens a WhatsApp chat with the cleaned number.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension opens a WhatsApp chat with the desired number. You don't need to add the number to your contacts to start the conversation

If the number you added has dashes, points, plus sign, or any non-numerical character, this extension removes them for you.
